home.welcomeSubtitle: Choose the creation feature you want to use
home.aiIllustrationDesc: Generate beautiful illustrations quickly with AI technology
home.createLayoutIllustrationDesc: Create multi-character illustrations with layout editor

aibooks.title: Create Picture Book
aibooks.promptPlaceholder: Please enter your creative idea, for example: A little girl meets a friendly little rabbit in the forest, and they explore a mysterious garden together
aibooks.emptyState: Please enter a prompt on the left and generate a picture book
aibooks.step1: 1. Enter story outline, generate story scenes
aibooks.step2: 2. Edit story scenes, generate picture book

healingWatercolor.elementDetails: Watercolor texture, fresh and soft tones, creating a calm and healing atmosphere.

penLineArt.elementDetails: Rich details, black and white lines, full composition, bright lighting.

colorfulOutlineRomanticism.elementDetails: Colorful outline illustration, unrestrained atmosphere, vivid colors and loose brushstrokes, playful and carefree scenes.

crayonNoiseHandDrawn.elementDetails: Crayon brush style, rough granular texture with irregular edges, simple hand-drawn feel. Warm soft tones as the base, adding noise effects to the image, replacing gradients with particle density.

vintageSketch.elementDetails: Hand-drawn colored sketches, rough lines, heavy textured brushstrokes, beige warm-toned background, vintage children's book style.

pixarStyle.elementDetails: High-quality 3D rendering, soft materials, studio effects, vivid expressions and movements.

engravingLines.elementDetails: Colorful images, exquisite lines, 0.01mm lines, using dots and lines to express light and shadow relationships, master-level line arrangement, detailed details, high-definition quality.

pencilSketch3D.elementDetails: Hand-drawn pencil sketch style, 3D design perspective, centered composition.

feltCollage.elementDetails: Handmade texture, bright colors, with decorative patterns such as polka dots and stripes, yellow background with white polka dots, material showing felt texture and thickness, cartoon-exaggerated character shapes.

collageIllustration.elementDetails: Paper collage style, showing flat perspective and texture through the use of clear shapes and color blocks. Overall atmosphere is cheerful and joyful, bright colors, lively and playful style.

doodleSoul.elementDetails: White background, minimalist, nine-grid layout, hand-drawn line art, doodle style, Prussian blue line outline, mixed creation of colored pencils and watercolors, manuscript texture, fun, Raymond Briggs style.

abstractFlatDesign.elementDetails: Stylized shapes, bright colors, cartoon-like visual effects, soft beige sky, evenly distributed light, calm and warm atmosphere, minimalist style.

simpleCartoon.elementDetails: Simple and bright, soft colors, pure white background, objects/characters have rounded bodies and short limbs.

oilPainting.elementDetails: Thick brushstrokes oil painting style, children's picture book, colorful light and shadow, clear brushstrokes, complex scenes, extreme details, ultra-high definition, 32k.

blackWhiteDoodle.elementDetails: A dense doodle illustration filled with various cartoon-style black line-drawn images. These elements are arranged randomly and repetitively, creating a chaotic yet vibrant atmosphere. Characters have simple lines, rounded outlines, and various expressions, showing innocence and humor. The composition is compact with no obvious white space. The entire image uses only black and white, with sharp contrast, consistent line thickness, and unified style. Lighting is even with no shadows, presenting a flat visual effect. The overall style is cartoon, doodle, with childlike fun and creativity, creating a casual yet imaginative feeling.

rusticHandDrawn.elementDetails: White background, minimalist, nine-grid, soul artist, hand-drawn line art, doodle style, Prussian blue line outline, little girl, fun, picture book style, illustrations in the style of Raymond Briggs and Mattias Adolfsson, mixed creation of colored pencils and watercolors, manuscript, masterpiece.

maximalistCopperplate.elementDetails: Copperplate style, full-frame, maximalism, black thick lines with clear outlines, high saturation, high contrast, blue as the main tone creating a peaceful atmosphere, paired with orange and white, delicate texture, rich layers, shaping an elegant and natural picture. Through exquisite brushstrokes and color layers, creating a peaceful, fresh, poetic and romantic atmosphere, showing romantic beauty and artistic value, allowing viewers to immerse themselves in a peaceful and beautiful visual experience, maximalism, rich details, decorative patterns, sense of layers, sense of space, presenting a sacred feeling, stunning picture, high-definition, high detail.

keithHaringDoodle.elementDetails: Thick line marker illustration, black and white color scheme, white background, decorative doodle patterns.

createCharacter.onlyImageFiles: Only image files can be uploaded!

createCharacter.fillCharacterNameOrPrompt: Please fill in character name or prompt

createCharacter.requestTimeout: Request timeout, please check network connection or try again later
createCharacter.backendNotRunning: Backend service not running, please check if the service is running
createCharacter.imageTooLarge: Image file too large, please upload an image smaller than 5MB
createCharacter.imageFormatError: Incorrect image format, please upload JPG or PNG format images
createCharacter.cannotGetImageUrl: Cannot get character image URL, please ensure the image was generated successfully
createCharacter.defaultPrompt: Based on the character image in the reference picture, create a single illustration character — a complete full-body portrait with clear details from the top of the head to the soles of the feet. The character should have well-proportioned limbs with no truncation, no shadows included, and only the character retained in the frame against a white background. A masterpiece-level work.
